item.title: How do I make an item where you have to kill me to wear it?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

make a new line in the moreinfo file.

killedOwner = 0

Means they can’t wear it.

killedOwner = 1

Means they can.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make an item where you have to kill me to wear it?
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

[quote=“Jeremy368, post:3, topic:259293”]That is very possible the guy above me is nub

I am not entirely sure on what exactly to do but i am pretty sure there are capes u have to kill a specific person to get i think there called death capes[/quote]

Thanks for calling me a nub >.<

Wouldn’t it be somthing like

You need to kill +playername+ in order to weild this item…
If (User) has killed +playername+ equipt item (id)
case (action)

Im not too sure but I think that is what you would have to do… If you search for like what you need to weild a firecape and it says jad then change that arround to suit the player that people need to kill to weild the item.
